entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change signature throws ArgumentException #71512
  • RemoteWorkspaceManager SimpleAssemblyLoader doesn't respect codeBasePath #71510
  • PEVerify/ILVerify test helpers should make sure that verification errors are obtained in English regardless of the current UI culture. #71509
  • CS8509 Doesn't flag nullable enums correctly #71508
  • The type name 'Empty' does not exist in the type 'Guid' #71504

Closed

  • IDE0004 erroneously says a collection expression cast is redundant #71511
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34505.47 #71513
  • System.InvalidOperationException with 2 complicated global alias's in a row #71502
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #71505
  • IDE0251 doesn't factor in InlineArrays #71500
    Next
  • IDE0305 codefix generates invalid code #71427

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in VB's PENamedTypeSymbol #71515
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix remove-unnecessary-cast with collection expressions. #71514
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix sorting of global aliases #71503
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer to make a member readonly if it potentially writes into an inline-array field. #71501
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fallback to a no-op nav-to searcher when one is not exported. #71499
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2346258 #71498
  • [Port][Inline Rename] Cosmetic improvements to Rename Suggestions (#71478) #71495
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2346062 #71491

Updated

  • Improve parsing performance with large collection expressions of numbers #71443
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community, 17.10
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move TestWorkspace to Workspace test layer, add EditorTestWorkspace to EditorFeatures layer #71407
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Fix semantic model for target typed collection expression elements #71496
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific error (if any) for explicit cast failure #71492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clarify semi-required properties #59047
    Area-IDE
  • Add severity filter to Fix All operations #71486
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations when creating CompositeText instances. #71493
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move background initialization to OnAfterPackageLoadedAsync #71047
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Params Collections: misc chanages #71423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
